translations.source: 15.3 消防设施和措施
translations.target: 15.3 Fire Protection Facilities and Measures

translations.source: 本项目正常情况下一般不易发生火灾，只有在操作失误、违反规程、管理不当及其它非正常生产的情况或意外事故状态下可能导致火灾发生。因此，为了防止火灾的发生，或减少火灾造成的损失，应采取必要的消防措施，设计中应贯彻“预防为主，防消结合”的方针。
translations.target: Under normal operating conditions, fires are generally unlikely to occur in this project; fires may occur only under abnormal production conditions or accidental incidents such as operating errors, violations of procedures, improper management, and other non-routine situations. Therefore, in order to prevent fires or reduce fire losses, necessary fire protection measures shall be adopted, and the design shall implement the principle of “prevention first, combining prevention with firefighting”.

translations.source: 15.3.1 总图运输
translations.target: 15.3.1 General Layout and Transportation

translations.source: 在厂区总平面布置时，按生产性质、工艺要求及火灾危险性的大小等分成相对独立的小区，各区间以道路相隔，各建筑物之间留有足够的防火间距。厂区道路呈环型布置，物流大门主物流通道采用12米，其它道路均为6米道路，道路上空净空高度大于5米，满足消防车辆通行的要求。
translations.target: In the overall plant layout, the site is divided into relatively independent zones according to production characteristics, process requirements, and the degree of fire hazard. Zones are separated by roads, and sufficient fire separation distances are reserved between buildings. Plant roads are arranged in a ring layout; the main logistics corridor at the logistics gate is 12 m wide, and all other roads are 6 m wide. The vertical clearance above the roads is greater than 5 m, meeting the access requirements for fire-fighting vehicles.
15.3.2 Process

translations.source: 1) 高层建构筑物设避雷带设施，防止雷击造成火灾。
translations.target: 1) Lightning protection belts are provided for tall buildings and structures to prevent fires caused by lightning strikes.

translations.source: 2) 炼焦采用热回收焦炉，生产过程中不产生易燃易爆的焦炉煤气和化工产品，从产品上杜绝了燃烧和爆炸的可能性。
translations.target: 2) The coking process adopts heat recovery coke ovens. During production, no flammable or explosive coke oven gas or chemical by-products are generated, thereby eliminating the possibility of combustion and explosion at the source.

translations.source: 3) 焦炉机械设有出焦联锁操作装置，避免红焦落地。
translations.target: 3) Coke oven machinery is equipped with a coke discharge interlock operating device to prevent red-hot coke from dropping onto the ground.

translations.source: 4) 在火灾危险性较大的场所设置安全标志及信号装置。
translations.target: 4) Safety signs and signal devices are installed in locations with higher fire hazards.
15.3.3 Architecture

translations.source: 本项目所有建筑物的平面布置、结构及材料选用均按《建筑设计防火规范》进行设计，厂房的防火要求根据工艺生产火灾危险性分类的不同而采用不同的措施。
translations.target: The plan layout, structures, and material selection of all buildings in this project are designed in accordance with the Code for Fire Protection Design of Buildings. Different measures are adopted for plant buildings depending on the fire hazard classification of the process production.

translations.source: 有爆炸危险的厂房按规定设有足够的泄压面积，利用门窗洞口泄压，并将厂房门窗向外开启，室内设不发生火花地坪。
translations.target: Workshops with explosion hazards are provided with sufficient explosion venting (pressure relief) area as required; pressure relief is achieved through door and window openings, and doors and windows are designed to open outward. Non-sparking flooring is provided indoors.

translations.source: 室内设两个以上出口或楼梯口，主要生产建构筑物按相应规定的耐火等级设计。
translations.target: Two or more exits or stairways are provided indoors. Major production buildings and structures are designed to the corresponding required fire-resistance rating.

translations.source: 在火灾危险性较大的场所按《建筑灭火器配置设计规范》的相应规定设置足够数量的移动式消防器材以满足消防要求。
translations.target: In locations with higher fire hazards, an adequate quantity of portable fire-fighting equipment is provided in accordance with the relevant provisions of the Code for Design of Extinguisher Distribution in Buildings to meet fire protection requirements.
15.3.4 Electrical

translations.source: 为保证消防设施的可靠性，所有消防设施均设两路电源供电，消防水泵设施采用自动启动控制。并在主要生产场所设事故照明。
translations.target: To ensure the reliability of fire protection facilities, all fire protection systems are supplied by two independent power sources, and the fire water pumps adopt automatic start control. Emergency lighting is provided in major production areas.

translations.source: 凡属火灾爆炸危险场所的电气设备选型均按《爆炸和火灾危险环境电力装置设计规范》规定执行。
translations.target: The selection of electrical equipment for locations with fire and explosion hazards shall comply with the Code for Design of Electrical Installations in Explosive and Fire Hazardous Environments.

translations.source: 为了防止雷击造成的损害，拟对中央变电所、汽机房等第一类防雷建筑物采用接闪器，使被保护的建筑物、设备、放散管、风帽等突出物体处于保护范围，并设独立的接地装置，接地电阻不大于10Ω。对除尘地面站等第二类防雷建筑物，采用避雷带措施，引下线不少于两根，并沿建筑物四周均匀对称布置，接地电阻不大于10Ω。对焦炉烟囱、煤塔、煤焦转运站等第三类防雷建筑物采取避雷带防雷措施，接地电阻不大于30Ω，防止雷击造成的危害。
translations.target: To prevent damage caused by lightning strikes, air-termination devices are proposed for Category I lightning-protection structures such as the central substation and turbine hall, so that the protected buildings, equipment, vent stacks, vent caps, and other protruding parts are within the protection zone. Independent grounding systems will be provided with a grounding resistance not exceeding 10 Ω. For Category II lightning-protection structures such as the ground dust collection station, lightning protection belts will be adopted, with not fewer than two down conductors arranged uniformly and symmetrically around the building; grounding resistance shall not exceed 10 Ω. For Category III lightning-protection structures such as the coke oven chimney, coal tower, and coal and coke transfer station, lightning protection belts will be adopted, with grounding resistance not exceeding 30 Ω, to prevent lightning-related hazards.

translations.source: 在生产重要场所如粉碎机房、焦炉煤塔、余热锅炉、汽轮机房、配电室、车间办公楼等均设有火灾自动报警装置。
translations.target: Automatic fire alarm systems are installed in critical production areas such as the crusher house, coke oven coal tower, waste heat boiler, steam turbine building, electrical distribution room, and workshop office building.
15.3.5 Ventilation

translations.source: 爆炸燃烧场所的通风设备均选用非燃体材料。在防爆区的通风设备均选用防爆型，并采用接地消除静电措施。
translations.target: Ventilation equipment in areas with explosion/combustion hazards is made of non-combustible materials. Ventilation equipment in explosion-proof areas is of explosion-proof type, and grounding measures are adopted to eliminate static electricity.

translations.source: 15.3.6 防火防爆
translations.target: 15.3.6 Fire and Explosion Protection

translations.source: 1) 在平面布置中，各生产区域、装置及建筑物间考虑足够的防火安全间距，并布置相应的消防通道。
translations.target: 1) In the layout, adequate fire safety separation distances are provided between production areas, units, and buildings, and corresponding fire lanes are arranged.

translations.source: 2) 在生产工艺系统中，在产生燃爆性介质的生产厂房内采取通风除尘措施降低爆炸性物质浓度。
translations.target: 2) In the process system, ventilation and dust collection measures are adopted in production workshops where flammable/explosive media may be generated to reduce the concentration of explosive substances.

translations.source: 3) 在建筑设计中严格执行《建筑设计防火规范》等规定，并按《建筑灭火器配置设计规范》等要求配置相应的消防器材。
translations.target: 3) In architectural design, the requirements of the Code for Fire Protection Design of Buildings and other relevant standards are strictly implemented, and corresponding fire-fighting equipment is provided in accordance with the Code for Design of Extinguisher Distribution in Buildings and other applicable requirements.

translations.source: 4) 在产生易燃爆的生产厂房内必须有良好的通风措施，降低爆炸物质浓度，防止气体积累。
translations.target: 4) Production workshops where flammable and explosive substances may be generated must have effective ventilation measures to reduce the concentration of explosive substances and prevent gas accumulation.

translations.source: 5) 厂房周围安装避雷设施，设备及管道安装可靠的防静电措施。
translations.target: 5) Lightning protection facilities are installed around workshops, and reliable anti-static measures are provided for equipment and piping.

translations.source: 6) 在电气设计中，消防设施拟采用双回路供电；在爆炸和火灾危险性场所严格按照环境的危险性质，根据《爆炸和火灾危险环境电力装置设计规范》规定配置相应的电气设备和灯具。
translations.target: 6) In electrical design, fire protection facilities are proposed to be supplied by dual circuits. In locations with explosion and fire hazards, appropriate electrical equipment and luminaires are selected strictly according to the hazard characteristics of the environment and in accordance with the Code for Design of Electrical Installations in Explosive and Fire Hazardous Environments.

translations.source: 7) 在消防给水设计中，根据《建筑设计防火规范》规定设置相应的消防管道、贮水池、消火栓等装置。
translations.target: 7) In fire water supply design, corresponding fire pipelines, water storage tanks/reservoirs, hydrants, and other facilities are provided in accordance with the Code for Fire Protection Design of Buildings.

translations.source: 15.3.7 消防给水排水
translations.target: 15.3.7 Fire Water Supply and Drainage

translations.source: 15.3.7.1 消防给水水量
translations.target: 15.3.7.1 Fire Water Demand

translations.source: 消防给水设计执行《建筑设计防火规范》，本项目占地面积18.525公顷，消防给水按一个着火点设计。厂区内室外消火栓最大用水量为30L/s,室内消火栓最大用水量为30L/s,室内自动喷水灭火系统最大用水量为50L/s,防火分隔水幕最大用水量为10L/s,全厂消防总用水量为120L/s,.选用的消防泵组采用两台电动泵，一台柴油泵备用，工作流量为120L/s,设计工作压力约1.0MPa。室内和室外消火栓灭火系统按照火灾延续时间为3小时考虑，室内自动喷水灭火系统和室内水幕系统按照火灾延续时间为1小时考虑。
translations.target: The fire water supply design follows the Code for Fire Protection Design of Buildings. The project covers an area of 18.525 ha, and the fire water supply is designed for a single fire point. The maximum water demand for outdoor hydrants is 30 L/s; for indoor hydrants, 30 L/s; for the indoor automatic sprinkler system, 50 L/s; and for the fire separation water curtain, 10 L/s. The total fire-fighting water demand for the whole plant is 120 L/s. The selected fire pump set consists of two electric pumps, with one diesel pump as standby; the duty flow is 120 L/s and the design duty pressure is about 1.0 MPa. The indoor and outdoor hydrant fire-extinguishing systems are designed for a fire duration of 3 hours, while the indoor automatic sprinkler system and the indoor water curtain system are designed for a fire duration of 1 hour.
15.3.7.2 Fire Water Piping Network

translations.source: 本项目消防给水管网为室内外消火栓合用，室外消防管网呈环状布置，采用地上式消火栓，消火栓间距≤120米，保护半径为150米。
translations.target: The fire water supply network of this project combines indoor and outdoor hydrants. The outdoor fire water network is arranged in a ring configuration and uses above-ground hydrants. Hydrant spacing is ≤ 120 m, with a protection radius of 150 m.

translations.source: 15.3.7.3 室内消防系统
translations.target: 15.3.7.3 Indoor Fire Protection System

translations.source: 本项目建筑物内设室内消火栓，自动喷水灭火系统及防火分隔水幕系统。
translations.target: Indoor hydrants, an automatic sprinkler fire-extinguishing system, and a fire separation water curtain system are provided in the buildings of this project.

translations.source: 15.3.8 消防器材
translations.target: 15.3.8 Fire-Fighting Equipment

translations.source: 在生产场所、办公楼等主要场所，根据《建筑灭火器配置设计规范》配备有相应的卤代烷灭火器、硫酸铵盐灭火器等消防器材。
translations.target: In major areas such as production areas and office buildings, appropriate fire-fighting equipment—such as halogenated hydrocarbon (halon-type) fire extinguishers and ammonium sulfate fire extinguishers—is provided in accordance with the Code for Design of Extinguisher Distribution in Buildings.

translations.source: 16 厂组织及劳动定员
translations.target: 16 Plant Organization and Staffing

translations.source: 本项目生产班制确定如下：管理部门执行常白班制、配备轮休人员，备煤车间年操作日365天、每天2班操作、1班轮休制度，炼焦车间年操作日365天、每天3班操作、1班轮休制度，熄焦车间年操作日365天、每天3班操作、1班轮休制度，筛焦车间年操作日365天、每天3班操作、1班轮休制度，全厂定员343人，其中厂部管理人员38人，生产人员209人，公用工程人员及其他人员96人。详见全厂定员表16-1。
translations.target: The shift system for this project is determined as follows: the management departments implement a regular day-shift schedule and are staffed with relief personnel; the coal preparation shop operates 365 days per year with two operating shifts per day plus one relief/off shift; the coking shop operates 365 days per year with three operating shifts per day plus one relief/off shift; the coke quenching shop operates 365 days per year with three operating shifts per day plus one relief/off shift; the coke screening shop operates 365 days per year with three operating shifts per day plus one relief/off shift. The total staffing of the whole plant is 343 persons, including 38 plant management staff, 209 production personnel, and 96 utilities and other personnel. See Table 16-1 for details.

translations.source: 表16-1   全厂定员表
